sentences.english: Only one state -- Michigan -- saw statistically significant increases in poverty two years in a row.
sentences.chinese: 只有密歇根州連續兩年貧困率攀升具有統計學意義。

sentences.english: In Asia, as cereal yields rose, poverty rates plummeted.
sentences.chinese: 如在亞洲，穀物產量增長，貧困率急劇下降。

sentences.english: They have higher poverty rates and lower education levels than other people.
sentences.chinese: 與其他人羣相比，他們貧困率更高，教育水平更低。

sentences.english: Sweden's tax-benefit system cuts its poverty rate by 80%.
sentences.chinese: 瑞典的賦稅優惠體系將其貧困率減少了80%。
